verses.verse: And Abram <WH87> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> out of Egypt <WH4714>, he, and his wife <WH802>, and all that he had, and Lot <WH3876> with him, into the south <WH5045>.
And Abram <WH87> was very <WH3966> rich <WH3513> <WH8804> in cattle <WH4735>, in silver <WH3701>, and in gold <WH2091>.

And he went <WH3212> <WH8799> on his journeys <WH4550> from the south <WH5045> even to Beit-El <WH1008>, unto the place <WH4725> where his tent <WH168> had been <WH1961> <WH8804> at the beginning <WH8462>, between Beit-El <WH1008> and Hai <WH5857>;

Unto the place <WH4725> of the altar <WH4196>, which he had made <WH6213> <WH8804> there at the first <WH7223>: and there Abram <WH87> called <WH7121> <WH8799> on the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068>.
And Lot <WH3876> also, which went <WH1980> <WH8802> with <WH854> Abram <WH87>, had flocks <WH6629>, and herds <WH1241>, and tents <WH168>.

And the land <WH776> was not able to bear <WH5375> <WH8804> them, that they might dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> together <WH3162>: for their substance <WH7399> was great <WH7227>, so that they could <WH3201> <WH8804> not dwell <WH3427> <WH8800> together <WH3162>.

And there was a strife <WH7379> between the herdmen <WH7462> <WH8802> of Abram's <WH87> cattle <WH4735> and the herdmen <WH7462> <WH8802> of Lot's <WH3876> cattle <WH4735>: and the Kanahanite <WH3669> and the Perizzite <WH6522> dwelled <WH3427> <WH8802> then in the land <WH776>.

And Abram <WH87> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Lot <WH3876>, Let there be <WH1961> <WH8799> no <WH408> strife <WH4808>, I pray thee, between me and thee, and between my herdmen <WH7462> <WH8802> and thy herdmen <WH7462> <WH8802>; for we <WH582> be brethren <WH251>.

Is not the whole land <WH776> before thee <WH6440>? separate thyself <WH6504> <WH8734>, I pray thee, from me: if thou wilt take the left hand <WH8040>, then I will go to the right <WH3231> <WH8686>; or if thou depart to the right hand <WH3225>, then I will go to the left <WH8041> <WH8686>.

And Lot <WH3876> lifted up <WH5375> <WH8799> his eyes <WH5869>, and beheld <WH7200> <WH8799> all the plain <WH3603> of Yarden <WH3383>, that it was well watered <WH4945> every where, before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> destroyed <WH7843> <WH8763> Sodom <WH5467> and Gomorrah <WH6017>, even as the garden <WH1588> of the YY <WH3068>, like the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, as thou comest <WH935> <WH8800> unto Zoar <WH6820>.

Then Lot <WH3876> chose <WH977> <WH8799> him all the plain <WH3603> of Yarden <WH3383>; and Lot <WH3876> journeyed <WH5265> <WH8799> east <WH6924>: and they separated themselves <WH6504> <WH8735> the one <WH376> from the other <WH251>.

Abram <WH87> dwelled <WH3427> <WH8804> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, and Lot <WH3876> dwelled <WH3427> <WH8804> in the cities <WH5892> of the plain <WH3603>, and pitched his tent <WH167> <WH8799> toward <WH5704> Sodom <WH5467>.
But the men <WH582> of Sodom <WH5467> were wicked <WH7451> and sinners <WH2400> before the YY <WH3068> exceedingly <WH3966>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8804> unto Abram <WH87>, after <WH310> that Lot <WH3876> was separated <WH6504> <WH8736> from him, Lift up <WH5375> <WH8798> now thine eyes <WH5869>, and look <WH7200> <WH8798> from the place <WH4725> where thou art northward <WH6828>, and southward <WH5045>, and eastward <WH6924>, and westward <WH3220>:
For all the land <WH776> which thou seest <WH7200> <WH8802>, to thee will I give it <WH5414> <WH8799>, and to thy seed <WH2233> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.

And I will make <WH7760> <WH8804> thy seed <WH2233> as the dust <WH6083> of the earth <WH776>: so that <WH834> if a man <WH376> can <WH3201> <WH8799> number <WH4487> <WH8800> the dust <WH6083> of the earth <WH776>, then shall thy seed <WH2233> also be numbered <WH4487> <WH8735>.
Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, walk <WH1980> <WH8690> through the land <WH776> in the length <WH753> of it and in the breadth <WH7341> of it; for I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> it unto thee.

Then Abram <WH87> removed his tent <WH167> <WH8799>, and came <WH935> <WH8799> and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in the plain <WH436> of Mamre <WH4471>, which is in Hevron <WH2275>, and built <WH1129> <WH8799> there an altar <WH4196> unto the YY <WH3068>.
